column3: Presence of defects from visual observations (3 Marks)
column4: No defects observed – 3; Minor defects observed – 2; Major defects observed - 0

column2: To assess the utilization of the infrastructure (10 Marks)
column4: Functioning and used as intended – 10mks; below – pro-rata basing on team judgement

column2: To assess the fulfillment/ adequacy of implemented environmental, Health, social & safety measures (6 marks)
column3: Evidence of implemented environmental and social/safety measures for infrastructure (6 marks)
column4: Physical evidence of satisfactory implementation of environmental protection measures – 3mks; Otherwise 0
Physical evidence of satisfactory implementation of social/ safety measures -3mks, otherwise 0

column3: To assess the extent of O&M for completed facilities
column5: Level of implementation of key audit recommendations >90%: Outstanding; >70% but <= 90%: Satisfactory; >50% but <=70%: Unsatisfactory; <=50%: Unacceptable

column4: Evidence of planning and budgeting for O&M activities
column5: O&M Plans and Budget Available: Outstanding; O&M Plans and Budget Not
